thread.title: Russia Rosatom says Egypt nuclear station talks in final stages - Economy - Business
thread.title_full: Russia Rosatom says Egypt nuclear station talks in final stages - Economy - Business - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Russia Rosatom says Egypt nuclear station talks in final stages - Economy - Business
text:
Related Egypt's Sisi to discuss free trade, industrial zone, nuclear energy with Putin in Russia visit Egypt to launch global tender for nuclear power plant by end of 2014 Russia's state-owned nuclear firm Rosatom is in final stages of talks for a contract to build a nuclear power station in Egypt, a senior official of the company said on Wednesday.
Anton Moskvin, Rosatom Overseas vice president, said that the deal was expected to be signed by the end of the year.
Speaking on a visit to the United Arab Emirates, Moskvin said construction of the plant, Egypt's first, at Dabaa in Egypt's north would finish by 2022 if a contract was signed by the end of 2015. The contract would involve a loan from Russia to Egypt, he said.
